title: Tell me about your favorite restaurant. Why do you like it?

korean: 집 근처에 이탈리안 레스토랑이 있는데, 거기 정말 자주 가.
파스타가 진짜 맛있어서 한 달에 두세 번은 가는 것 같아.
분위기도 아늑하고 조명이 은은해서 데이트하기 좋아.
직원분들이 친절하고 서비스도 빨라서 기다리는 스트레스가 없어.
가격도 합리적이라 부담 없이 갈 수 있어.
와인 종류도 다양해서 골라 먹는 재미가 있어.
특히 주말 브런치 메뉴가 인기라 예약 필수야.
인테리어도 깔끔하고 사진 찍기 좋아서 인스타에 자주 올려.
사장님이 요리에 진심이라 메뉴가 자주 바뀌는데, 매번 새로워.
english: There's an Italian restaurant near my house, and I, like, go there really often.
The pasta is really delicious, so I think I go two or three times a month.
Both carbonara and aglio olio are, you know, perfect.
The atmosphere is cozy and the lighting is soft, so it's good for dates.
The staff is kind and the service is fast, so there's no stress waiting.
The price is also reasonable, so I can go without burden.
There's a variety of wines, so there's fun in choosing and eating.
Especially the weekend brunch menu is popular, so, well, reservation is a must.
The eggs benedict and salad set are really generous.
The interior is clean and good for taking pictures, so I often post on Instagram.
The owner is serious about cooking, so the menu changes often, and, I mean, it's new every time.
I'll continue to be a regular in the future.
